Package gui

Class BorrowBookFrameController

java.lang.Object
gui.BorrowBookFrameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IController
public class BorrowBookFrameController extends Object implements IController
Controller for the "Borrow Book" frame, allowing subscribers to borrow books. The frame validates input data such as subscriber ID, book ID, borrow date, and return date.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, String bookId) throws Exception
      Starts the "Borrow Book" frame.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - the primary stage to display the frame.
      bookId - the ID of the book to prefill in the book ID field, if available.
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an error loading the FXML file.

    • initializeText

      public void initializeText(String bookId)
      Initializes the book ID field with a given value.
      Parameters:
      bookId - the ID of the book to set in the book ID field.

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initializes the frame. Sets the default borrow date to today and configures the return date picker to allow dates only up to two weeks after the borrow date.

    • onBorrowBtnClick

      private void onBorrowBtnClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the borrow button click event. Validates the input fields and sends a borrow request to the server. Displays an alert with the result of the borrow operation.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by the button click.

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(String title, String message)
      Displays an alert dialog with the given title and message.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the alert dialog.
      message - the message content of the alert dialog.
